Plot: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become room-mates when their parents marry.
Title: Step Brothers
Writer: Will Ferrell (screenplay), Adam McKay (screenplay), Will Ferrell (story), Adam McKay (story), John C. Reilly (story)
Actors: Will Ferrell, John C. Reilly, Mary Steenburgen, Richard Jenkins
tomatoConsensus: The relentless immaturity of the humor is not a total handicap for this film, which features the consistently well-matched talents of Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly.
